snippet: The family of Jahi McMath, 13, who was declared brain-dead after complications from surgery last month at Children’s Hospital Oakland, said on Monday that she had been transferred to a facility that will provide her with care.
abstract: Family of Jahi McMath, 13-year-old girl who was declared brain-dead after complications from sleep apnea surgery at Children’s Hospital Oakland, says that she has been transferred to facility that will provide her with care.
lead_paragraph: The family of Jahi McMath, 13, who was declared brain-dead after complications from surgery last month at Children’s Hospital Oakland, said on Monday that she had been transferred to a facility that will provide her with care.

headline.main: California: Girl Declared Dead Is Transferred
headline.print_headline: California: Girl Declared Dead Is Transferred
